title: kuyilE unakk-ananta kOTi
sahitya:
kuyilE unakk-ananta kOTi namaskAram kumaran varak-kUvuvAi nI kumaran varak-kUvuvAi


anupallavi

  mayilgaL ulAvum malai mAngkani shOlaiyil maruvum unai pirindu murugan arugil vara


caraNam 1    inbattai tandavar tunbattai tIrArO idayattai toTTavar en mukham pArArO
    caraNam 2    anbar kurai tIrkkum paNbadanaikk-ennuyir Arvattai vella shuddhAnanda kani uNDu
